reviewText: the first series of the best videogame icon, i live in the u.s. and got this from UK took about 3 weeks for delivery, it didn't play on my PS3 but still managed to watch them, i still watch them every saturday morning. WORD OF ADVISE to US BUYERS be aware this is a PAL disc and it won't play on NTSC DVD players (US) but you can still watch them on a laptop or convert them to NTSC.
